title: The New ship
creator_credit: Tony Eggleton and Department of the Navy
brief_description: Shows the Royal Australian Navy’s first American built vessel, the guided missile destroyer Perth, with scenes of the crew in training and at leisure in America, the delivery and commissioning ceremony.
creator_credit_for_label: Tony Eggleton and Department of the Navy
